ValidationRule.description: Require State field if Country is equals to ‘Australia’, ‘Brazil’, ‘Canada’, ‘China’, ‘India’, ‘Japan’, ‘Mexico’, and ‘United States’
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( State__c , 'Australia'), ISPICKVAL( State__c , 'Brazil'), ISPICKVAL( State__c , 'Canada'), ISPICKVAL( State__c , 'China'), ISPICKVAL( State__c , 'India'), ISPICKVAL( State__c , 'Japan'), ISPICKVAL( State__c , 'Mexico'), ISPICKVAL( State__c , 'United States') ) , ISPICKVAL( State__c, '' ) , False)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: State should have a value if Country is equals to ‘Australia’, ‘Brazil’, ‘Canada’, ‘China’, ‘India’, ‘Japan’, ‘Mexico’, or ‘United States’
